You leave your home and you don’t know if you will make it back. This is outrageous that the weak progressive Democrats allow this to happen. No one is doing anything about it, but blame it on COVID. Crime has been terrible for years ever since Deblazio took office this city has really gotten worse.  I pray the next mayor takes a strong stand on crime and doesn’t back down on all the progressive politicians and progressive movements who are anti police and pro-crime. Wake up NY now is the time
